author: sky.cactus
content: Someone should make a bridge that doesn't suck.  For whatever reason, this particular bridge that is being used is incredibly simple and just does plain text bridging, which makes it hard to read.

author: potuz
content: For specs purposes, what's the actual definition of the type `G2Point` here? https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/eip4844/beacon-chain.md#trusted-setup

author: carlbeek
content: but you are correct that it is currently undefined in those specs

author: carlbeek
content: <@415109946682769408> is working on a PR for making 4844 executable and it is defined there https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2901/files#diff-877e1e5724c308a7cf5e82e84db584165d680cbdac04a76b244fa28991b4d69eR51
